sentence.Network_en: The reiteration of this figure, more than anything else, wrecked the conservative chance of coming back.
sentence.Network_cn: 重申这数字, 比其它任何事情更能打消保守党重新上台的机会.

sentence.Network_en: The final statement is just a reiteration of U.S. policy on Taiwan.
sentence.Network_cn: 艾瑞里?最后一个声明只是重复宣读美国对台政策.

sentence.Network_en: Melancholy, weariness, tedium? the reiteration of the note cannot be coincidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 忧郁 、 疲 累 、 无聊,这些语调一再重复,绝非是巧合.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 其中复现(reiteration)又分为同义词和近义词(synonym,near-synonym),重复(same word,repetition),下义词(synonym)和泛指词(general.

LOVELY UNIVERSITIES ... 【电影理论】 film theory 【叠句】 reiterative sentence 【叠字】 reiterative locution.
my opinion is confirmed , and I reiterate my advice .'我的意见得到了证实，我重申我的劝告。”
reinoculation 再接种reiterated genes 重复基因reiterated sequences 重复序列

entry.tran: （通常为了强调）重复讲，反复说，重申
entry.def: If you reiterate something, you say it again, usually in order to emphasize it.

example.ex: He reiterated his opposition to the creation of a central bank...
example.tran: 他重申了自己反对成立央行的立场。

example.ex: I want to reiterate that our conventional weapons are superior.
example.tran: 我要再次重申，我们的常规武器是一流的。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of repeating over and again (or an instance thereof)

auth_sentence.content: It's basically just a reiteration of what any climate scientist, anywhere, would tell you.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's basically just a reiteration of what any climate scientist, anywhere, would tell you.

auth_sentence.content: Freeh's statement was a reiteration of his public position that he has no plans for an early exit.
